quote: A cynic is a blackguard whose faulty vision sees things as they are, and not as they ought to be.
A leader has the vision and conviction that a dream can be achieved. He inspires the power and energy to get it done.
As selfishness and complaint pervert and cloud the mind, so love with its joy clears and sharpens the vision.
Camp is a vision of the world in terms of style - but a particular kind of style. It is love of the exaggerated.
Capital isn't scarce; vision is.
A cynic is a blackguard whose faulty vision sees things as they are, and not as they ought to be.
A leader has the vision and conviction that a dream can be achieved. He inspires the power and energy to get it done.
As selfishness and complaint pervert and cloud the mind, so love with its joy clears and sharpens the vision.
Camp is a vision of the world in terms of style - but a particular kind of style. It is love of the exaggerated.
Capital isn't scarce; vision is.
Every age needs men who will redeem the time by living with a vision of the things that are to be.
Every creator painfully experiences the chasm between his inner vision and its ultimate expression.
Every man takes the limits of his own field of vision for the limits of the world.
Every person takes the limits for their own field of vision for the limits of the world.
Everyone takes the limits of his own vision for the limits of the world.
I would give all the wealth of the world, and all the deeds of all the heroes, for one true vision.
If you want a vision of the future, imagine a boot stamping on a human face - forever.
In the light of his vision he has found his freedom: his thoughts are peace, his words are peace and his work is peace.
It is a terrible thing to see and have no vision.
It is critical vision alone which can mitigate the unimpeded operation of the automatic.
It seems some have chosen to ignore or have simply forgotten the big-picture vision promoted by Dr. King and his kin.
It takes vision and courage to create - it takes faith and courage to prove.
Knowledge is love and light and vision.
Leaders must invoke an alchemy of great vision.
Nothing is so easy to fake as the inner vision.
Now man cannot live without some vision of himself.
The best vision is insight.
The only human value of anything, writing included, is intense vision of the facts.
The only thing worse than being blind is that you do have sight but no vision .
The very essence of leadership is that you have to have a vision.
The very essence of leadership is that you have to have vision. You can't blow an uncertain trumpet.
Throughout the centuries there were men who took first steps, down new roads, armed with nothing but their own vision.
To come to be you must have a vision of Being, a Dream, a Purpose, a Principle. You will become what your vision is.
Vision is the art of seeing things invisible.
We go where our vision is.
When I think of vision, I have in mind the ability to see above and beyond the majority.
Where there is no vision, there is no hope.
You have to see the pattern, understand the order and experience the vision.
